meanings.definition: Having a tendency to kiss or be affectionate
meanings.sent1: The puppy was smoochier than the cat, always giving kisses.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the smoochier greeting of a hug over a simple handshake.
meanings.sent3: The smoochier teddy bear in the store seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her smoochier nature made her the heart of every gathering.
meanings.sent5: The smoochier sunsets in the countryside painted the sky with love.

meanings.definition: Comparatively more affectionate or romantic than something else
meanings.sent1: The smoochier movie had everyone in tears with its love story.
meanings.sent2: His smoochier gestures, like leaving love notes, always melted her heart.
meanings.sent3: The smoochier flowers in the garden seemed to sway in a romantic dance.
meanings.sent4: Their smoochier relationship was the envy of all their friends.
meanings.sent5: The smoochier melodies of the violin filled the room with emotion.
